playerIntro1: Welcome to Collectors! Please choose your name:
playerIntro2: Now pic a color you like:
invite: Invite other players with this link:
_comment: För att komma åt den här infon kör lables.helpPlayerHand.title exempelvis

helpPlayerHand.title: Player Hand:
helpPlayerHand.itemAreaText: Items is how you earn points in this game. The Red symbol corresponds to the same symbol in the market area.
helpPlayerHand.skillsAreaText: In the green area your skills are shown. they give you bonuses and are important. Click on the ? next to skills on the playerBoard for more information.
helpPlayerHand.handAreaText: These cards are in your hand. You can spend bottles to place these cards on the playerBoard or buy them as a skill or item. They are also used as currencies in the auction
helpPlayerHand.nextTurnText: In the grey area you are shown what will happen next turn. Your income next turn, how many cards you will get andhow many bottles.

skillsHelp.title: Info about skills:
skillsHelp.intro: The green area of a card indicates which skill it has. There is six different types of skills and here you will learn about them.
skillsHelp.skillsArea: You can buy a skill by clicking on the buttons under the cards in the green area. By doing so the card will belon to you and you aquire the corresponding skills
skillsHelp.nextTurn: If you own this skill you will gain two extra dollars when you place a worker(bottle) in the work area
skillsHelp.DrawCardSkill: If you own this skill you will draw one card to your hand when you place a worker(bottle) in the work area
skillsHelp.auctionSkill: You will gain one extra dollar everytime an auction is started. This skill works for every auction that is started. It will also stack.
skillsHelp.gainWorker: This skill will activate directly so that you have an extra bottle to use for the rest of the game
skillsHelp.VPSpecific: Gain one extra score for each card in this category you own as an item, this skill will stack and there is multiple for each different category.
skillsHelp.VPAll: This is the big boy. If you own atleast one of each item at the end of this game and own this skil you will get five extra score to your total.
